attributes.action: The Royal family should be held accountable under British law
attributes.additional_details:
The Royals official website states "civil and criminal proceedings cannot be taken against the Sovereign as a person under UK law".

It is the belief of the people that this is outdated and the Royal family should be held accountable like everyone else.

We request that the law be changed to allow civil and criminal proceedings be taken against the Sovereign as a person under UK law.
